name: Boba Finance
description: Introducing Boba Finance Protocol 2.0, the first on Pirichain blockchain. Is the pioneering yield optimizer on the Pirichain blockchain ecosystem. Boba Finance goes beyond the capabilities of a typical yield optimizer. In addition to automatically compounding your LP strategy, Boba Finance also offers an auto-stake feature. This means that the rewards you earn will be automatically invested in the respective farm. When providing LP, users have the flexibility to choose between auto-compound and auto-stake options, and the ratio will be adjusted accordingly.
